text:
@realDonaldTrump The IRS issued drafts of the 2020 941 document, Employer’s Quarterly Federal Tax Return, and its instructions to be used beginning with the second quarter return (April 1 to June 30) that must be filed by July 31. See- https://t.co/tB29Rhh9bs

#HR #IRS #payroll #Tax #Covid19
